original_title: Commonwealth Chamber of Commerce Chief visits BOI
original_body_lines: Commonwealth Chamber of Commerce Chairperson Julia Charlton on Monday met with the Board of Investment Chairman Dinesh Weerakkody and officials as well as those of the Colombo Port City to explore potential investment opportunities and to organise a high level business delegation to Sri Lanka. Commonwealth and Enterprise Council Member Niro Cooke and Commonwealth Chamber of Commerce’s Lawyer Ankita Yadav participated in the meeting.
